definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wrap, or wind up, together (cf. Ar. s.anifah;un hem of garment, Targum:J [[חְנׇפָא]] skirt ( = [[כָּנׇף]]); [[מַחְנֵפָא]] turban, ChrPal. mas.napto0 tassel);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחְנׁף]] Le 16:4 he shall wind (his head) with ([[ב]]) the turban ([[מִחְנֶפֶת]] q.v.); sf., + Inf. abs. and acc. cogn. [[חָנוֹף יִחְנׇפְְ]] [[חְנֵפָה]] Is 22:18 he will wind thee entirely up (with) a winding (under fig. of ball, to be driven far off, in exile).—[[חנוף]] Is 62:3 v. following.
